summary: The Name is actualy Aktos\'er, it didn\'t allow me to use this char in the topic. The Aktos\'er race is the best race for a Battle-Mage.
descriptionHtml:
MESSEGE: This is a test-upload. I never uploaded a mod to Nexus before, and I\'m not yet sure it\'ll work for you. I\'ll update it as son as I can if it works or not.

The mod is also availabe in Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=109862150

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my second race mod. Check out my first one as well, If you wish: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=94726708

The Aktos\'er race is a race for a Battle Mage. He gets a One handed, Restoration and Destruction bonus. He is going to have 4 diffrent spells, there are 2 available right now:

1) POWER: Battle Mage\'s fate: for some time, you get 50% resistence to Frost and Fire, And a One handed bonus.
2) RESTORATION: Ward-heal: It can Heal you and cast a Ward at the same time for just 1 hand.
3) BURN THE LIGHT: A spell that allows you to cast Lightining and Fire from just 1 hand in the same time.
4) Lingofot: Lingfot is a remake of the spell \"Wall of flames\", but it has also a freeze effect and it has some more effects that you\'ll probably wont notice, but still. But - Since its so strong, it has to be casted with 2 hands, and cost alot. 

FOLLOWER LIST:
-------------------------

1) In Whiterun, near the priest who screams about Talos.
2) In Riften, in the Market.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PROGRESS: (X = Not yet done, V = Done, IP = Work in progress)

Good First-Person: V
Good Third Person: V
Special Spells: IP (3/4)
Positive/Negetive stuff: V
Aktos\'er Followers: V (2/2)
Aktos\'er Merchants: X (0/2)
Quests (maybe..): X
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
POSITIVE/NEGETIVE STUFF

(+) The Aktos\'er gets a faster Magicka and Stamina Regeneration
(+) The Aktos\'er starts with more Magicka and Stamina
(+) The Aktos\'er gets a bonus on One Handed, Destruction and Restoration.
(-) The Aktos\'er Starts with a less Carry Weight
(-) The Aktos\'er Starts with less Health
(-) The Aktos\'er Regenerate his health slower.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
UPDATES

Update 0.1 (25 November): Added a race description, and some positive/negetive stuff.
Update 0.2: added a new spell: \"Burn the light\".
Update 0.3: Added a follower of the Aktos\'er. You can find him in Whiterun, sitting in-front of the priest who screams about Talos.
Update 0.4: Added another follower. She sits in the Market of Riften.
Update 0.5: Some basic race changes, and bug fix for the female voice for some people.
Update 0.6: Due a problem with the Creation Kit (solved now) I was\'nt able to update the mod in the last couple days. Anyways, this update brings the final spell. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

30 November: I\'ve added a little video of the Race.
author: MasterFqF
